overview: When 30 something Sean meets Eastern European immigrant Wolf, sparks fly.  They return to Seanâ€™s apartment and begin a high energy and hugely sexual affair.  What starts as a mere chance meeting slowly evolves into something more. Wolf is easy going, turning tricks to supplement his living, while Sean is needy, talkative and neurotic. Creating a stable relationship is fraught with problems. With Wolf disappearing for hours at a time and Sean doing drugs the two of them seem to be headed down a path of destruction.
title: Deleted Scenes
